00036 #ifndef __LSUPPORT_H__
00037 #define __LSUPPORT_H__
00038 
00039 #include <assert.h>
00040 #include <unistd.h>
00041 #include <stdint.h>
00042 
00043 #include <lnet/types.h>
00044 
00045 #define GSSD_CLI        (0)
00046 #define GSSD_SVC        (1)
00047 
00048 void gssd_init_unique(int type);
00049 void gssd_exit_unique(int type);
00050 
00051 /*
00052  * copied from lustre source
00053  */
00054 
00055 #define LUSTRE_GSS_SVC_MGS      0
00056 #define LUSTRE_GSS_SVC_MDS      1
00057 #define LUSTRE_GSS_SVC_OSS      2
00058 
00059 extern const char * lustre_svc_name[];
00060 
00061 struct lgssd_upcall_data {
00062         uint32_t        seq;
00063         uint32_t        uid;
00064         uint32_t        gid;
00065         uint32_t        svc;
00066         uint64_t        nid;
00067         char            obd[64];
00068 };
00069 
00070 #define GSSD_INTERFACE_VERSION        (1)
00071 
00072 struct lgssd_ioctl_param {
00073         int             version;        /* in   */
00074         int             secid;          /* in   */
00075         char           *uuid;           /* in   */
00076         int             lustre_svc;     /* in   */
00077         uid_t           uid;            /* in   */
00078         gid_t           gid;            /* in   */
00079         long            send_token_size;/* in   */
00080         char           *send_token;     /* in   */
00081         long            reply_buf_size; /* in   */
00082         char           *reply_buf;      /* in   */
00083         long            status;         /* out  */
00084         long            reply_length;   /* out  */
00085 };
00086 
00087 #define GSSD_DEFAULT_GETHOSTNAME_EX     "/etc/lustre/nid2hostname"
00088 #define MAPPING_DATABASE_FILE           "/etc/lustre/idmap.conf"
00089 
00090 int lnet_nid2hostname(lnet_nid_t nid, char *buf, int buflen);
00091 void cleanup_mapping(void);
00092 int lookup_mapping(char *princ, lnet_nid_t nid, uid_t *uid);

00094 #endif /* __LSUPPORT_H__ */
